Text: Lakeland ANR Languageare trying to incorporate the potential ANR capacity into Florida into the Lakeland proposal as a put Please take a look at the attached draft language for the termsheet Thanks Rick Forwarded by Richard A BlandfordHOUECT on AM Richard A Blandford PM To Jared CT Scott CT Janet R CT David L CT cc Subject Lakeland ANR Language Attached is a rough cut of the language for the Lakeland put option of the potential ANR Capacity
Lakeland TAAttached is a revised version of the TA lets discuss this version before making any more revisions

Lakleand TA Cc Heres the revised TA which reflects the terms of the proposal which was provided to Lakeland last night Please review and advise me of any changes which you determine are needed Thanks Rick

Gas Supply Proposal Cc Here is the latest termsheet which needs to be incorporated into the Transaction Agreement as soon as possible I am meeting with them the first part of next week and need to be able to tender them a document Forwarded by Richard A BlandfordHOUECT on AM Richard A Blandford PM To David L CT cc Subject Gas Supply Proposal Rolando At last As promised enclosed please find a revised Delivered Gas Supply Proposal which incorporates the value of Lakelands ability to switch among alternate fuels Once you review the enclosed let me know when you can set aside time for David and I to meet with you and and walk through the proposal in detail Rick
